snippet: As the political attacks on Mitt Romney's record at Bain Capital have intensified, some buyout giants are punching back, including Hamilton James of Blackstone.
abstract: As the political attacks on Mitt Romney's record at Bain Capital have intensified, some buyout giants are punching back, including Hamilton James of Blackstone.
lead_paragraph: As the political attacks on Mitt Romney's record at Bain Capital have intensified, many have wondered when the private equity industry would try to mount a full defense of its practices. Now, after months of quiet complaining, some buyout defenders are punching back.

headline.main: Private Equity's Defenders Emerge From Shadows
